changeSet.author: buberpolina
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE expenses ( id INT NOT NULL, paydate DATE, receiver INT, value DECIMAL(5,2), PRIMARY KEY (id) );

changeSet.author: buberpolina

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO receivers VALUES (1,'Amazon Online Shopping'), (2,'Target Retail Store'), (3,'Shell Gas Station'), (4,'Apple Online Store'), (5,'Starbucks Coffee Shop');

changeSet.author: buberpolina
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE expenses ADD FOREIGN KEY (receiver) REFERENCES receivers(id);

changeSet.author: buberpolina
changeSet.sql: SELECT receivers.name, SUM(expenses.value) as total FROM receivers JOIN expenses ON receivers.id = expenses.receiver GROUP BY receivers.name;

changeSet.author: buberpolina
changeSet.sql: SELECT receivers.name, MAX(expenses.value) as max_payment, SUM(expenses.value) as total FROM receivers JOIN expenses ON receivers.id = expenses.receiver WHERE expenses.paydate = (SELECT paydate FROM expenses WHERE receiver = receivers.id ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 1) GROUP BY receivers.name;

changeSet.author: buberpolina
changeSet.sql: SELECT receivers.name, MAX(daily_expenses.max_payment) as max_payment, daily_expenses.total FROM receivers JOIN (SELECT receiver, paydate, MAX(value) as max_payment, SUM(value) as total FROM expenses GROUP BY receiver, paydate) as daily_expenses ON receivers.id = daily_expenses.receiver WHERE daily_expenses.total = (SELECT total FROM (SELECT receiver, paydate, SUM(value) as total FROM expenses WHERE receiver = receivers.id GROUP BY receiver, paydate ORDER BY total DESC LIMIT 1) as subquery) GROUP BY receivers.name, daily_expenses.total;
